plot: A woman wakes up from rain on her pillow. When she gets out of bed the rain follows her. She carries the rain with her through the day.
title: Regn
plot_es: A woman wakes up from rain on her pillow. When she gets out of bed the rain follows her. She carries the rain with her through the day.
plot_en: A woman wakes up from rain on her pillow. When she gets out of bed the rain follows her. She carries the rain with her through the day.
